wikipedia_page.main: Paul Christopher Chapman (born 28 September 1951) is a Welsh former footballer who played in the Football League for Plymouth Argyle.

response: Paul Chapman (born 5 November 1981) is a former professional Australian rules footballer who played for the Geelong Football Club and Essendon Football Club in the Australian Football League (AFL).
